layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  RenderView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  RenderBlock {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x600
    RenderBody {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x584
      LayoutTable {TABLE} at (0,0) size 784x38
        LayoutTableSection {TBODY} at (0,0) size 784x38
          LayoutTableRow {TR} at (0,0) size 784x38
layer at (8,8) size 150x38
  LayoutTableCell {TD} at (0,0) size 150x38 [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
    LayoutTable {TABLE} at (0,0) size 150x38 [border: (10px outset #808080)]
      LayoutTableSection {TBODY} at (10,10) size 130x18
        LayoutTableRow {TR} at (0,0) size 130x18
layer at (18,18) size 130x18 clip at (19,19) size 128x16
  LayoutTableCell {TD} at (0,0) size 130x18 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
    RenderText {#text} at (1,1) size 125x16
      text run at (1,1) width 125: "left column content"
layer at (158,8) size 634x38
  LayoutTableCell {TD} at (150,11) size 634x16 [r=0 c=1 rs=1 cs=1]
    RenderText {#text} at (0,0) size 72x16
      text run at (0,0) width 72: "second cell"
